original_title: E:60 Presents 20 Years and 11 Seconds: The Travis Roy Story
overview: It was 11 seconds into Travis Roy's first shift of his career as a Boston University forward when a collision with the boards changed his life forever. Twenty years later, Travis reflects on the moment that has led him to a new life and a new passion.
title: E:60 Presents 20 Years and 11 Seconds: The Travis Roy Story
